EraScore.title: Tribal Village Contacted
EraScore.description: A Tribal Village was contacted, giving strength to our budding cities.

EraScore.title: Threatening Camp Destroyed
EraScore.description: A hostile barbarian camp within 6 tiles of one of your cities was destroyed by a unit.

EraScore.title: Barbarian Camp Destroyed
EraScore.description: A hostile barbarian camp was leveled to the ground by a unit, spreading peace through the area.

EraScore.title: Final Foreign City Taken
EraScore.description: You have taken control of a civilization's last remaining city.

EraScore.title: World's First to Meet All Civilizations
EraScore.description: You are the first to meet all living civilizations in the world.

EraScore.title: First Trading Posts in All Civilizations
EraScore.description: You are the first in the world to establish a Trading Post in all civilizations.

EraScore.title: World's First Flight
EraScore.description: You own the world's first flying unit! People rejoice at the new possibilities this entails.

EraScore.title: World's First Circumnavigation
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first to reveal a tile in every vertical line of the map. This forms a path around the world, even if the path does not end where it began.

EraScore.title: World's First Religion to Adopt All Beliefs
EraScore.description: Your Religion is the first in the world to add its final Belief and become complete.

EraScore.title: Unique Building Constructed
EraScore.description: You have completed this unique building for the first time.

EraScore.title: World Wonder Completed
EraScore.description: A world wonder is completed, showing our grandeur over other civilizations.

EraScore.title: Rival Holy City Converted
EraScore.description: The Holy City of another Religion has converted to our Religion.

EraScore.title: Foreign Capital Taken
EraScore.description: You have taken control of a foreign power's original capital city.

EraScore.title: Unique District Completed
EraScore.description: You have completed this unique district for the first time.

EraScore.title: Emergency Successfully Defended
EraScore.description: As the target, you have succeeded in fighting off an Emergency against you.

EraScore.title: First Discovery of a New Continent
EraScore.description: Our civilization's explorers are the first in the world to find this continent.

EraScore.title: World's First National Park
EraScore.description: You have founded the world's first National Park.

EraScore.title: World's First Martian Colony Established
EraScore.description: You are the first in the world to establish a colony on Mars.

EraScore.title: World's First Landing on the Moon
EraScore.description: You are the first in the world to land on the moon.

EraScore.title: World's First Satellite in Orbit
EraScore.description: You launched the world's first satellite into orbit.

EraScore.title: Unique Unit Marches
EraScore.description: You have trained this unique unit for the first time, giving you an edge on the battlefield.

EraScore.title: World's First Exoplanet Expedition Launched
EraScore.description: You are the first in the world to launch an expedition to a distant planet.

EraScore.title: World's First Shipwreck Excavated
EraScore.description: Your archaeologists have completed the world's first excavation of a shipwreck.

EraScore.title: Religion Adopts All Beliefs
EraScore.description: Your Religion has added its final Belief and is now complete.

EraScore.title: First Aerodrome Fully Developed
EraScore.description: You have completed every building in an Aerodrome district for the first time.

EraScore.title: First Encampment Fully Developed
EraScore.description: You have completed every building in an Encampment district for the first time.

EraScore.title: First Entertainment Complex Fully Developed
EraScore.description: You have completed every building in an Entertainment Complex district for the first time.

EraScore.title: First Water Park Fully Developed
EraScore.description: You have completed every building in a Water Park district for the first time.

EraScore.title: Old World Wonder Completed
EraScore.description: A World Wonder is completed. Even though it belongs to a bygone era, it will still show our grandeur over other civilizations.

EraScore.title: World's Largest Civilization
EraScore.description: Your civilization has become the largest in the world, with at least 3 more cities than its next biggest rival.

EraScore.title: City of Awe
EraScore.description: A city is placed within 2 tiles of a natural wonder.

EraScore.title: Enemy City Adopts Our Religion
EraScore.description: An enemy city, despite being at war, has seen the light and adopted our Religion.

EraScore.title: Splendid Campus Completed
EraScore.description: You have completed your civilization's first Campus with a starting adjacency bonus of 3 Science or higher.

EraScore.title: Splendid Commercial Hub Completed
EraScore.description: You have completed your civilization's first Commercial Hub with a starting adjacency bonus of 4 Gold or higher.

EraScore.title: Splendid Harbor Completed
EraScore.description: You have completed your civilization's first Harbor with a starting adjacency bonus of 4 Gold or higher.

EraScore.title: Splendid Holy Site Completed
EraScore.description: You have completed your civilization's first Holy Site with a starting adjacency bonus of 3 Faith or higher.

EraScore.title: Splendid Industrial Zone Completed
EraScore.description: You have completed your civilization's first Industrial Zone with a starting adjacency bonus of 4 Production or higher.

EraScore.title: Splendid Theater Square Completed
EraScore.description: You have completed your civilization's first Theater Square with a starting adjacency bonus of 3 Culture or higher.

EraScore.title: World's First Neighborhood
EraScore.description: You have completed the world's first Neighborhood district.

EraScore.title: Emergency Completed Successfully
EraScore.description: As a member, you have succeeded in an Emergency.

EraScore.title: First Discovery of a Natural Wonder
EraScore.description: Our civilization's explorers are the first in the world to behold this natural wonder.

EraScore.title: First Tier 1 Government in World
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first to adopt a Tier 1 Government in the world.

EraScore.title: First Tier 2 Government in World
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first to adopt a Tier 2 Government in the world.

EraScore.title: First Tier 3 Government in World
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first to adopt a Tier 3 Government in the world.

EraScore.title: Great Person Lured by Faith
EraScore.description: A Great Person has traveled to our lands to share unique talents, thanks to our use of Faith to make up more than half their recruitment cost.

EraScore.title: Great Person Lured by Gold
EraScore.description: A Great Person has traveled to our lands to share unique talents, thanks to our generous stipend of Gold.

EraScore.title: World's First Seaside Resort
EraScore.description: You have completed the world's first Seaside Resort tile improvement.

EraScore.title: National Park Founded
EraScore.description: You have founded a National Park.

EraScore.title: Met All Civilizations
EraScore.description: You have met all living civilizations in the world.

EraScore.title: World's First Religion
EraScore.description: Your people are the first to form a Religion, bringing light to the world at large!

EraScore.title: Trading Posts in All Civilizations
EraScore.description: You have established a Trading Post in all civilizations.

EraScore.title: Taking Flight
EraScore.description: You own your first flying unit. People rejoice at the new possibilities this entails.

EraScore.title: World's First Seafaring
EraScore.description: You own the world's first seafaring unit! A world of possibility awaits on the horizon.

EraScore.title: Enemy Veteran Defeated
EraScore.description: One of your units defeated an enemy unit with at least 2 more promotions than it.

EraScore.title: World Circumnavigated
EraScore.description: Your civilization has revealed a tile in every vertical line of the map. This forms a path around the world, even if the path does not end where it began.

EraScore.title: First Resource consumed for Power in World
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first in the world to consume a resource to generate Power for its cities.

EraScore.title: First Tier 4 Government in World
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first to adopt a Tier 4 Government in the world.

EraScore.title: First Mountain Tunnel in World
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first to build a Mountain Tunnel in the world.

EraScore.title: First Green Improvement in World
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first to build a tile improvement dedicated to providing renewable Power in the world.

EraScore.title: First Railroad Connection in World
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first to build a Railroad to connect two of its cities in the world.

EraScore.title: First Rock Band Concert in World
EraScore.description: Your civilization is the first to perform a Rock Band concert in the world.

EraScore.title: First Industry in the World
EraScore.description: The first Industry in the world has been created.

EraScore.title: First Corporation in the World
EraScore.description: Money made conceptual flesh - the world sees the establishment of its first Corporation! Time to take out the competition.

EraScore.title: First Luxury Resource Monopoly in the World
EraScore.description: You are the first civilization in the history of the world to control a monopoly over a luxury resource!
